Name: Venus
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Review: Gin-laced raspberry with hints of bitter orange. If available, use raspberry syrup in place of unflavoured sugar syrup.
